includedNonTaxableProfits.title: Included not-taxable profits
includedNonTaxableProfits.description: Income, receipts and other profits included in business income or expenses but not taxable as business profits

basisAdjustment.title: Basis adjustment
basisAdjustment.description: If your basis period is not the same as your accounting period, enter the adjustment needed to arrive at the profit or loss for the basis period – if the adjustment needs to be taken off the profit figure, this should be negative

accountingAdjustment.title: Accounting adjustment
accountingAdjustment.description: Adjustment for change of accounting practice

averagingAdjustment.title: Averaging adjustment
averagingAdjustment.description:
Averaging adjustment (only for farmers, market gardeners and creators of literary or artistic works)
– if the adjustment needs to be taken off the profit figure, this should be negative

lossBroughtForward.title: Loss brought forward
lossBroughtForward.description: Loss brought forward from earlier years

outstandingBusinessIncome.title: Outstanding business income
outstandingBusinessIncome.description: Any other business income not included in other fields

balancingChargeBPRA.title: Balancing charge BPRA
balancingChargeBPRA.description: Balancing charge on sale or cessation of business use (only where Business Premises Renovation Allowance has been claimed)

balancingChargeOther.title: Balancing charge Other
balancingChargeOther.description: Balancing charge on sale or cessation of business use (where you have disposed of assets for more than their tax value)

goodsAndServicesOwnUse.title: Goods and services own use
goodsAndServicesOwnUse.description: Value of the normal sale price of goods or stock have been taken out of the business.

overlapProfitCarriedForward.title: Overlap profit carried forward
overlapProfitCarriedForward.description:
Any overlap profit carried forward from previous years plus any new overlap profits from this year
 or minus any overlap relief used this year that is available to carry forward.

overlapProfitBroughtForward.title: Overlap profit brought forward
overlapProfitBroughtForward.description: Overlap profit that has been brought forward from previous years to use in the current year.

lossCarriedForwardTotal.title: Total loss to carry forward after all other set-offs
lossCarriedForwardTotal.description:
Total loss to carry forward after all other set-offs - you can carry forward your loss, or the amount
 of loss not used against income or capital gains, to set against any future profits from the same business.

cisDeductionsTotal.title: Total Construction Industry Scheme (CIS) deductions taken from your payments by contractors
cisDeductionsTotal.description:
Total Construction Industry Scheme (CIS) deductions taken from your payments by contractors 
- if you're a subcontractor, add up all your deductions made by contractors in tax year.

taxDeductionsFromTradingIncome.title: Other tax taken off trading income
taxDeductionsFromTradingIncome.description: If you have any other tax taken off (not CIS deductions) Other tax taken off trading income

class4NicProfitAdjustment.title: Adjustment to profits chargeable to Class 4 National Insurance Contributions
class4NicProfitAdjustment.description: Adjustment to profits chargeable to Class 4 National Insurance Contributions
